= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *mouth-parotid-gland*: produces 25% of saliva in oral cavity, mostly serous
  * *Mouth - submandibular gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_SXG AVA.PN.PSYM.SXG] -> mouth-submandibular-gland): produces 70% of saliva in oral cavity, mixed serous (moisturing) and mucous (process food)
  * *Mouth - sublingual gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_SXG AVA.PN.PSYM.SXG] -> mouth-sublingual-gland): produces 5% of saliva in oral cavity, mostly mucous
  * *Mouth - parotid gland vasoconstrictors* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_SCG AVA.PN.SYM.SCG] -> mouth-parotid-gland-vasoconstrictors): reduces glandular bloodflow
  * *Mouth - submandibular gland vasoconstrictors* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_SCG AVA.PN.SYM.SCG] -> mouth-submandibular-gland-vasoconstrictors): reduces glandular bloodflow, thereby decreasing the volume of fluid in salivary secretions
  * *Mouth - sublingual gland vasoconstrictors* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_SYM_SCG AVA.PN.SYM.SCG] -> mouth-sublingual-gland-vasoconstrictors): reduces glandular bloodflow
  * *Mouth - hard palate mucous gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PTG AVA.PN.PSYM.PTG] -> mouth-hard-palate-mucosal-gland): produce mucous fluid; lubrication, immunological defence
  * *Mouth - soft palate mucous gland* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PTG AVA.PN.PSYM.PTG] -> mouth-soft-palate-mucosal-gland): produce mucous fluid; lubrication, immunological defence
  * *Mouth - tongue gustatory hair cell* (mouth-tongue-hair-cell -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): taste sensation
  * *Mouth - epiglottis* (mouth-epiglottis-taste-buds -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_NOD AVA.PN.SG.NOD]): taste sensation
  * *Mouth - soft palate sparse taste receptors* (soft-palate-sparse-taste-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_GNG AVA.PN.SG.GNG]): taste sensation
  * *Mouth - palatine tonsil* (mouth-palatine-tonsil -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): providing antibodies against illnesses and diseases such as diphtheria
  * *Mouth - lingual tonsil* (mouth-lingual-tonsil -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): production of antibodies that are part of natural immune system
  * *Mouth - uvula receptors* (mouth-uvula-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): preventing food from entering the nasal cavity
  * *Mouth - musculus uvulae muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_PTG AVA.PN.PSYM.PTG] -> mouth-uvulae-muscle): elevates and retracts the uvula, thickening the central part of the soft palate; shortens and broadens the uvula
  * *Mouth - teeth* (mouth-teeth -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_TRG AVA.PN.SG.TRG]): chewing
  * *Mouth tongue muscles* (mouth-tongue-muscles)
   * *mouth-genioglossus-muscle*: keeps airway open and enables tongue to stick out and retract
   * *Mouth - hyoglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> mouth-hyoglossus-muscle): depress and retract the tongue, important in singing
   * *Mouth - styloglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> mouth-styloglossus-muscle): chewing, talking, suckling, and many other functions of tongue
   * *Mouth - chondroglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> chondroglossus-muscle): depresses tongue
   * *Mouth - palatoglossus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> palatoglossus-muscle): raising the back part of the tongue
   * *Mouth - transverse muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> transverse-tongue-muscle): narrows and elongates tongue
   * *Mouth - vertical muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> vertical-tongue-muscle): flattens tongue
   * *Mouth - inferior longitudinal muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> tongue-inferior-longitudinal-muscle): shortens, retracts, pulls tip downward
   * *Mouth - stylohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] -> mouth-stylohyoid-muscle): draw hyoid bone backwards and elevate tongue; elevate the hyoid during swallowing
  * *Mouth phonatory larynx muscles* (mouth-larynx-phonatory-muscles): move vocal cords together and serve production of voice
   * *lateral-cricoarytenoid-muscle*: adduct and medially rotate the cartilage, pulling the vocal ligaments towards the midline and backwards and so closing off the rima glottidis
   * *Mouth - arytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> arytenoid-muscle): approximate the arytenoid cartilages (close rima glottidis)
   * *Mouth - cricothyroid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> cricothyroid-muscle): tension and elongation of the vocal folds (has minor adductory effect)
   * *Mouth - thyroarytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> thyroarytenoid-muscle): thickens the vocal folds and decreases length; also helps to adduct the vocal folds during speech
   * *Mouth - oblique arytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> oblique-arytenoid-muscle): sphincter of the laryngeal inlet
   * *Mouth - posterior cricoarytenoid muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> posterior-cricoarytenoid-muscle): abducts and laterally rotates the cartilage, pulling the vocal ligaments away from the midline and forward and so opening the rima glottidis
   * *Mouth - thyroepiglottic muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> thyroepiglottic-muscle): closes the inlet to the larynx
   * *Mouth - aryepiglottic muscle* ([BrainRegionAVA_PN_PSYM_ILG AVA.PN.PSYM.ILG] -> aryepiglottic-muscle): close the inlet
  * *Mouth - swallowing muscles* (swallowing-muscles)
   * *digastric-muscle-facial*: opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed
   * *Mouth - digastric muscle, trigeminal* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> digastric-muscle-trigeminal): opens the jaw when the masseter and the temporalis are relaxed
   * *Mouth - geniohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_SAN HMA.SC.VH.SAN] -> geniohyoid-muscle): carry hyoid bone and the tongue upward during deglutition
   * *Mouth - mylohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> mylohyoid-muscle): raises oral cavity floor, elevates hyoid, depresses mandible
   * *Mouth - inferior pharyngeal constrictor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> inferior-pharyngeal-constrictor-muscle): swallowing
   * *Mouth - middle pharyngeal constrictor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> middle-pharyngeal-constrictor-muscle): swallowing
   * *Mouth - superior pharyngeal constrictor muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> superior-pharyngeal-constrictor-muscle): swallowing
  * *Mouth - respiratory larynx muscles* (mouth-larynx-respiratory-muscles): move vocal cords apart and serve breathing
  * *Mouth - thyrohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> mouth-larynx-thyrohyoid-muscle): depresses the hyoid and elevates the larynx
  * *Mouth - palatine tonsil receptors* (palatine-tonsil-receptors -> [BrainRegionAVA_PN_SG_JUG AVA.PN.SG.JUG]): visceral mucous membrane over soft palate and tonsil
  * *Mouth - masseter muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-masseter-muscle): elevation (as in closing of the mouth) and retraction of mandible
  * *Mouth - lateral pterygoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-lateral-pterygoid-muscle): depresses mandible
  * *Mouth - medial pterygoid muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-medial-pterygoid-muscle): elevates mandible, closes jaw, helps lateral pterygoids in moving the jaw from side to side
  * *Mouth - temporal muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> masticatory-temporal-muscle): elevation and retraction of mandible
  * *Mouth - proprioception receptors of masticatory muscles* (masticatory-unconscious-muscle-spindles -> [BrainRegionHMA_MM_MSTR HMA.MM.MSTR]): unconscious proprioception from muscle spindles; monosynaptic masticatory reflex
  * *Mouth - levator muscle of thyroid gland* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> thyroid-gland-levator-muscle): elevates the thyroid gland
  * *Mouth - levator veli palatini muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> levator-veli-palatini-muscle): elevates soft palate
  * *Mouth - omohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> omohyoid-muscle): depresses the larynx and hyoid bone; carries hyoid bone backward and to the side
  * *Mouth - palatopharyngeus muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] -> palatopharyngeus-muscle): pulls pharynx and larynx
  * *Mouth - sternohyoid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> sternohyoid-muscle): depress hyoid bone
  * *Mouth - sternothyroid muscle* ([BrainRegionBMA_SC_VH_VM BMA.SC.VH.VM] -> sternothyroid-muscle): elevates larynx, may slightly depress hyoid bone
  * *Mouth - superior longitudinal muscle of tongue* ([BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] -> superior-longitudinal-muscle-tongue): shortens, turns tip upward, turns lateral margins upward
  * *Mouth - tensor veli palatini muscle* ([BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] -> tensor-veli-palatini-muscle): tension of the soft palate
